en: Dreams came true.
zh: 梦想成真了。

en: Dreams are the touchstones of our characters.
zh: 梦想是衡量一个人品格的试金石。

en: Dreams come true.
zh: 梦想成真。

en: My dream is to take a round-the-world trip.
zh: 我的梦想是环游世界。

en: Anything can happen in the world of dreams.
zh: 在梦里什么都可能发生。

en: The main thing that dreams lack is consistency.
zh: 梦境最缺的就是连贯性。

en: Little did I think that I would ever see her again.
zh: 我压根没想到还会再见到她。

en: I never dreamed that I would meet her again.
zh: 我做梦也没想到会再遇见她。

en: Little did I dream that I would see you here.
zh: 我做梦也没想到会在这儿见到你。

en: I never dreamed I would meet you here.
zh: 我做梦也没想到会在这儿碰到你。

en: It may not be a dream.
zh: 这也许不是梦。

en: Dreams may be vivid and memorable.
zh: 梦境有时会非常清晰，让人难忘。

en: I'm very pleased that your dream came true.
zh: 我真为你梦想成真感到高兴。

en: His dream came true.
zh: 他的梦想实现了。

en: May all my dreams come true.
zh: 愿我所有的梦想都成真。

en: May all your dreams come true.
zh: 祝你梦想成真。

en: I was watching TV half sleeping.
zh: 我半睡半醒地看着电视。

en: He blamed me for neglecting my duty.
zh: 他怪我没尽到责任。

en: I can't fall asleep.
zh: 我睡不着。

en: I can't sleep.
zh: 我睡不着。

en: I can't sleep, and I'm just looking at the clock.
zh: 我睡不着，就一直盯着表看。

en: You had better turn off the light before you go to sleep.
zh: 睡觉前你最好把灯关了。

en: See to it that your cigarette is put out before you go to bed.
zh: 睡觉前记得把烟掐灭。

en: When we are asleep, bodily functions slow down and body temperature falls.
zh: 我们睡觉时，身体机能会变慢，体温也会下降。

en: I lay down not so much to sleep as to think.
zh: 我躺下不是为了睡觉，而是为了想点事。

en: I couldn't sleep.
zh: 我那时睡不着。

en: Sleep is the greatest thief, for it steals half one's life.
zh: 睡眠是最大的小偷，因为它偷走了人的一半寿命。

en: I'm a light sleeper.
zh: 我睡觉很轻。

en: I need to get some sleep.
zh: 我得睡会儿。

en: Let a sleeping dog lie.
zh: 别自找麻烦。

en: Take care lest you should fall asleep.
zh: 小心点，别睡着了。

en: Take care not to awake the sleeping baby.
zh: 小心别吵醒睡觉的宝宝。

en: It is delightful to look at a sleeping baby.
zh: 看着睡着的小宝宝感觉真好。

en: A sleeping child looks like an angel.
zh: 睡着的孩子像天使一样。

en: I had my wallet stolen while I was asleep.
zh: 我睡觉的时候钱包被偷了。

en: Wake not a sleeping lion.
zh: 别惊醒沉睡的狮子。

en: He looked asleep, but he was really dead.
zh: 他看着像是睡着了，其实已经死了。

en: Are you sleeping, Tom?
zh: 汤姆，你睡了吗？

en: The sleepy town has been transformed into a bustling city.
zh: 这个寂静的小镇已经变成了一座繁华的城市。

en: In order to stay awake I may have to drink more coffee.
zh: 为了不打瞌睡，我可能得再喝点咖啡。

en: Feeling sleepy, I went to bed.
zh: 困了，我就去睡了。

en: Since I was sleepy, I went to sleep.
zh: 因为太困了，我就去睡觉了。

en: Aren't you sleepy?
zh: 你不困吗？

en: You should not sit up late just because it has charm.
zh: 就算熬夜有意思，你也不该熬那么晚。

en: As I was sleepy, I went to bed.
zh: 我挺困的，就去睡了。

en: Sleepy as I was, I managed to finish my homework.
zh: 尽管我很困，还是把作业写完了。

en: We yawn when sleepy or bored.
zh: 犯困或者无聊的时候，我们会打哈欠。

en: Refresh yourself with a cup of coffee when sleepy.
zh: 困了就喝杯咖啡提提神。

en: It is no use studying when you are sleepy.
zh: 困的时候学习没什么用。

en: No wonder I'm sleepy.
zh: 怪不得我这么困。

en: I'm sleepy, so I am leaving now.
zh: 我困了，先走了。

en: I'm sleepy, so I'm leaving now.
zh: 我困了，先走了。

en: Are you sleepy?
zh: 你困了吗？

en: I'm sleepy!
zh: 我好困啊！

en: I'm sleepy.
zh: 我困了。

en: Ethnic minorities struggle against prejudice, poverty, and oppression.
zh: 少数民族在与偏见、贫困和压迫作斗争。

en: Attention is focussed on the potential for growth of the personal and industrial use garbage compactor market in relation to trends in law.
zh: 大家的注意力都集中在法律趋势下个人和工业垃圾压缩机市场的增长潜力上。

en: The people revolted against their rulers.
zh: 人民起义反抗统治者。

en: The people suffered under the cruel tyrant.
zh: 人民在残暴的暴君统治下受苦。

en: People rose in revolt against the King.
zh: 人民起义反抗国王。

en: The people revolted against the tyranny.
zh: 人民起义反抗暴政。

en: The people followed the dictator like so many sheep.
zh: 人民像羊群一样跟着独裁者。

en: The Democrats bought space on commercial television for the campaign.
zh: 民主党为了竞选买了商业电视广告。

en: Do you think the Democratic Party will get the better of the Republican Party?
zh: 你觉得民主党能赢过共和党吗？

en: The Democrats haven't decided on their candidates yet, but in any case they're sure to lose.
zh: 民主党还没定好候选人，反正他们肯定会输。

en: One of the advantages of living in a democracy is that one is permitted to say whatever he thinks.
zh: 住在民主国家的一个好处就是你可以畅所欲言。

en: Democracy is one form of government.
zh: 民主是政府的一种形式。

en: Democracy is not exportable like food or cement.
zh: 民主不像食物或水泥那样可以出口。

en: Democracy encourages freedom.
zh: 民主鼓励自由。

en: Democracy originated in Ancient Greece.
zh: 民主起源于古希腊。

en: I believe it will be quite a long time before the spirit of democracy pervades our daily life.
zh: 我觉得民主精神要渗透到日常生活中还需要很长时间。

en: Individual freedom is the soul of democracy.
zh: 个人自由是民主的灵魂。

en: The precious results of democracy are the apple of the people's eye and the people will fight to maintain these ideals.
zh: 民主的宝贵成果是人民的掌上明珠，人民会为了维护这些理想而奋斗。

en: Some have lost faith in democracy.
zh: 有些人已经对民主失去了信心。

en: Democracy is the government of the people, by the people, and for the people.
zh: 民主是民有、民治、民享的政府。

en: In a democracy, the people elect their government officials directly.
zh: 在民主体制下，人民直接选举政府官员。

en: In a democracy, all citizens have equal rights.
zh: 在民主体制下，所有公民都享有平等的权利。

en: A commercial airplane allegedly violated military airspace.
zh: 据说一架民航飞机侵犯了军事领空。

en: I'm eager to be allowed to do more private-sector investment.
zh: 我很渴望能获准进行更多的私营部门投资。

en: The voice of the people is the voice of God.
zh: 人民的声音就是上帝的声音。

en: Strange to say, she knows the fact very well.
zh: 说来也怪，她对事实非常了解。

en: Strange to say, I didn't feel any pain.
zh: 说来也怪，我一点儿都没觉得疼。

en: Strangely enough, I didn't feel any pain at all.
zh: 说来也怪，我真的一点儿疼的感觉都没有。

en: I heard a strange sound.
zh: 我听到了一个奇怪的声音。

en: Strange to say, none of us noticed the mistake.
zh: 说来也怪，我们谁都没发现那个错误。

en: Queer rumors are in the air.
zh: 到处都在传一些奇怪的谣言。

en: Strange rumors are going around.
zh: 正在流传一些奇怪的传闻。

en: I wake up to the sound of music.
zh: 我在音乐声中醒来。

en: Strange to say, I dreamed the same dream twice last night.
zh: 说来也怪，我昨晚做了两个一模一样的梦。

en: Strange to say, she suddenly disappeared.
zh: 说来也怪，她突然消失了。

en: My pulse is slow.
zh: 我的脉搏很慢。

en: My pulse is fast.
zh: 我的脉搏很快。

en: Hey, there's no pulse.
zh: 嘿，没脉搏了。

en: Bees provide us with honey.
zh: 蜜蜂为我们提供蜂蜜。

en: Even though Sato has a nice personality, he doesn't know its value and doesn't like himself.
zh: 虽然佐藤性格很好，但他不知道这有多宝贵，而且他不喜欢自己。

en: Let's drink to our charming hostess!
zh: 让我们为迷人的女主人干杯！

en: Charms strike the sight, but merit wins the soul.
zh: 美貌悦目，但才德动人。

en: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
zh: 实现明天理想的唯一障碍就是今天的疑虑。

en: The future pilot is trained in a mock cockpit.
zh: 未来的飞行员在模拟驾驶舱里接受训练。

en: How can you be so optimistic about the future?
zh: 你怎么对未来这么乐观？

en: There is no knowing what will happen in the future.
zh: 以后会发生什么，谁也说不准。

en: I gave up on receiving the unpaid salary.
zh: 那些欠我的工资，我打算不要了。

en: When you come across new words, you must look them up in your dictionary.
zh: 遇到生词，你一定要查字典。

en: Persons under age are prohibited from smoking.
zh: 未成年人禁止抽烟。

en: Minors are prohibited from smoking by law.
zh: 法律规定未成年人禁止抽烟。

en: Adults only.
zh: 仅限成年人。

en: Minors aren't allowed to enter.
zh: 未成年人禁止入内。

en: No minors allowed.
zh: 未成年人禁入。

en: I have never been to Paris.
zh: 我从没去过巴黎。

en: The miso soup has heated up.
zh: 味噌汤热好了。

en: Could I have a sample taste?
zh: 我能尝一下吗？

en: It is tastes every bit as good as Japanese rice.
zh: 这吃起来和日本大米一样好。

en: How about the taste?
zh: 味道怎么样？

en: Does it taste okay?
zh: 味道还好吗？

en: Reading comics is usually viewed as the pastime of children.
zh: 看漫画通常被看作是小孩子的消遣。

en: Under the cartoon, he wrote "Get your hot dogs!"
zh: 在漫画下面，他写着“快来买热狗！”

en: Manga are to the Japanese film industry what bestsellers are to Hollywood.
zh: 漫画之于日本电影界，就像畅销书之于好莱坞。

en: Enough is as good as a feast.
zh: 知足常乐。

en: I am full, and I can eat no more.
zh: 我吃饱了，再也吃不下了。

en: I intend to get full marks.
zh: 我打算考满分。

en: A look of contentment appeared on his face.
zh: 他脸上露出了满足的神情。

en: You look contented.
zh: 你看起来挺满足的。

en: You look content.
zh: 你看起来挺知足的。

en: I'm satisfied.
zh: 我很满意。

en: Happy is a man who is contented.
zh: 知足的人最快乐。

en: It is better to be Socrates dissatisfied than a pig satisfied.
zh: 宁做痛苦的苏格拉底，不做快乐的猪。

en: All the seats are booked.
zh: 位子都被订光了。

en: The seats are all sold out.
zh: 座位都卖完了。

en: It was by no means unanimous but your proposal was selected.
zh: 虽然不是全票通过，但你的提议还是被选中了。

en: Was it a full moon or a new moon?
zh: 当时是满月还是新月？

en: A full moon is shining bright in the sky.
zh: 天上挂着一轮明月。

en: I thought I was going to suffocate on the crowded train.
zh: 火车上太挤了，我感觉快要窒息了。

en: A contented mind is a perpetual feast.
zh: 知足常乐。

en: Fill it up.
zh: 加满。

en: Fill it up, please.
zh: 请加满。

en: I'm suffering from chronic constipation.
zh: 我有慢性便秘。

en: I have chronic dermatitis.
zh: 我有慢性皮炎。

en: The curtain fell amid the wild applause of the audience.
zh: 在观众的热烈掌声中，帷幕落下了。

en: I know it very well.
zh: 我很了解。

en: All is still.
zh: 四下里静悄悄的。

en: Do you have a fountain pen with you?
zh: 你身上带钢笔了吗？

en: I'll stand by you through thick and thin.
zh: 无论发生什么，我都会支持你。

en: I will do it at all costs.
zh: 我不惜一切代价也要做到。

en: The young men said that they would do it despite all of the difficulties.
zh: 那些年轻人说，不管多困难，他们都会去做。

en: Manjiro played a part in making the two countries friends with each other.
zh: 万次郎在促进两国友好关系中起到了一定作用。

en: Have everything ready.
zh: 把东西都准备好。

en: All is well.
zh: 一切都好。

en: Everything is all right.
zh: 没什么问题。

en: Everything's ready.
zh: 全都准备好了。

en: Everything is ready!
zh: 都准备好了！

en: Everything went right for me.
zh: 我事事都很顺。

en: Everything went smoothly.
zh: 一切都很顺利。

en: Everything is alright.
zh: 没事儿。

en: Everything's fine.
zh: 都挺好的。

en: It is all over with me. It can't be helped.
zh: 我彻底完了，没救了。

en: Circumstances are entirely favorable to us.
zh: 形势对我们非常有利。

en: Much depends upon the result.
zh: 结果至关重要。

en: Everything depends upon the results.
zh: 全看结果怎么样了。

en: Everything fell into my lap.
zh: 好事全落我头上了。

en: Money is everything.
zh: 钱就是一切。

en: Everything goes well.
zh: 万事顺利。

en: I will see that all goes well.
zh: 我会盯着点，保证不出差错。

en: Who knows but everything will go well?
zh: 谁知道呢，没准一切都会好起来的。

en: Workers of the world, unite!
zh: 全世界无产者，联合起来！

en: If we should miss the train, we'll go by bus.
zh: 万一没赶上火车，我们就坐大巴。

en: If we miss the train, we'll go by bus.
zh: 要是没赶上火车，我们就坐大巴。

en: If he should die tomorrow, what in the world would you do?
zh: 万一他明天有个三长两短，你到底该怎么办？

en: What if the rainy season should set in tomorrow.
zh: 要是明天就开始进入雨季了该怎么办？

en: Should it rain tomorrow, the baseball game will be postponed.
zh: 万一明天下雨，棒球赛就得推迟。

en: If it should rain tomorrow, I will put off my departure till the first fine day.
zh: 明天要是下雨，我就等天晴了再走。

en: If it should rain tomorrow, the game would be called off.
zh: 万一明天下雨，比赛就取消了。

en: If it should rain tomorrow, they will not go.
zh: 万一明天下雨，他们就不去了。

en: If it rains tomorrow, they will not go.
zh: 要是明天下雨，他们就不去了。

en: If by any chance it rains tomorrow, they will not go.
zh: 万一明天下雨，他们就不打算去了。

en: If it should rain tomorrow, I would stay home.
zh: 要是明天下雨，我就待在家里。

en: If it should rain tomorrow afternoon, we will meet in the gym.
zh: 要是明天下午下雨，咱们就在体育馆见。

en: How disappointed my parents would be, if I should fail!
zh: 万一我考砸了，我父母该多失望啊！

en: What would you do, if you should be taken ill?
zh: 万一你病倒了，你打算怎么办？

en: If she should come late, give her this message.
zh: 万一她来晚了，就把这话转告她。

en: If you should meet him, tell him to call me up.
zh: 你要是碰见他，让他给我回个电话。

en: Should he come, what should I say to him?
zh: 万一他来了，我该跟他说点啥？

en: If he comes, what should I say to him?
zh: 他要是来了，我该跟他说什么？

en: Should he come, give him this paper.
zh: 要是他来了，就把这张纸给他。

en: If by any chance he comes, give him this paper.
zh: 万一他真来了，就把这张纸给他。

en: If he comes, give him this paper.
zh: 他要是来了，就把这纸给他。

en: If by any chance he comes, I'd like you to give him this paper.
zh: 万一他过来了，麻烦你把这张纸交给他。

en: If by any chance he should come, I want you to give him this document.
zh: 万一他真的来了，我想让你把这份文件交给他。

en: If he should be busy, help him.
zh: 要是他正忙着，你就帮帮他。

en: If by any chance he's busy, help him.
zh: 万一他挺忙的，你就去帮把手。

en: If he's busy, help him.
zh: 他要是忙，你就帮帮他。

en: If he should call, tell him I am busy.
zh: 万一他打电话来，就说我正忙着。

en: If he calls, tell him I am busy.
zh: 他要是打电话来，就说我有事在忙。

en: Should he hear of your marriage, he will be furious.
zh: 要是让他听说你结婚了，他非气炸了不可。

en: If he should call me, please tell him I'll be back in an hour.
zh: 万一他打电话找我，麻烦告诉他我一个小时后回来。

en: If by any chance he comes here, I'll let you know at once.
zh: 万一他来这儿，我会马上告诉你。

en: Should he see you, he would be surprised.
zh: 要是让他看见你，他肯定会吓一跳。

en: If he saw you, he'd be surprised.
zh: 他要是看见你，准得大吃一惊。

en: If I should be suddenly spoken to in English, I might run away.
zh: 要是突然有人跟我说英语，我可能会扭头就跑。

en: Should it be fine, I will go.
zh: 要是天气好，我就去。

en: If the weather is good, I'll go.
zh: 天气要是好的话，我就去。

en: If by some chance the weather is good, I'll go.
zh: 万一天气好，我就去。

en: If I should be late, start dinner without me.
zh: 要是我迟到了，你们就先吃，别等我。

en: Should World War III come about, there would be no winners at all.
zh: 要是真的爆发了第三次世界大战，根本就不会有赢家。

en: What would become of us if war should break out?
zh: 要是真的打仗了，我们该怎么办？

en: Were a serious crisis to arise, the government would have to act swiftly.
zh: 万一发生了严重的危机，政府必须迅速采取行动。

en: If anything should be wrong with my car, I would go by bus.
zh: 万一我的车出什么毛病，我就坐公交。

en: If something were wrong with my car, I'd go by bus.
zh: 要是我的车坏了，我就坐公交。

en: If I should fail, I would try again.
zh: 要是我失败了，我会再试一次。

en: If you should fail, don't lose heart.
zh: 万一失败了，也别灰心。

en: Don't get discouraged if you should fail.
zh: 失败了也别气馁。

en: Should I fail, I would try again.
zh: 万一我失败了，我会再试一次的。

en: If for some reason I failed, I'd try again.
zh: 要是由于某种原因我失败了，我会再试试。

en: If by some chance I failed, I'd try again.
zh: 万一我要是失败了，我还会再试的。

en: Should I fail, what would my parents say?
zh: 万一我失败了，我爸妈会怎么说？

en: In the unlikely event that I failed, what would my parents say?
zh: 万一我真的没成，我爸妈得怎么说啊？

en: Should he call me in my absence, please tell him that I will call him back.
zh: 要是我不在的时候他打电话过来，请告诉他我会回给他的。

en: Should I be late, don't wait for me.
zh: 要是我迟到了，别等我。

en: If by any chance I'm late, please don't wait for me.
zh: 万一我要是迟到了，请千万别等我。

en: If for some reason I'm late, please don't wait for me.
zh: 要是由于某种原因我迟到了，请别等我。

en: If I should die, please offer my heart to someone who needs it.
zh: 万一我不在了，请把我的心脏捐给有需要的人。

en: A man who should stop thinking would no longer be a man.
zh: 一个人要是停止了思考，那就不再是人了。

en: If for some reason a man stopped thinking, that man would no longer be a man.
zh: 如果一个人因为某种原因不再思考，那他就不再是人了。

en: If a tiger should come out of the cage, what would you do?
zh: 要是老虎从笼子里钻出来了，你怎么办？

en: If you should meet a bear, pretend to be dead.
zh: 要是碰上熊，就装死。

en: If you were to quit your job, what would you do?
zh: 你要是辞职了，打算干嘛？

en: If we should miss the express, we'll take the next train.
zh: 要是没赶上这班快车，我们就坐下一班。

en: If you should change your mind, let me know.

zh: 人不可貌相。

en: Look at me with your books closed.
zh: 把书合上，看着我。

en: I spent hours reading books.
zh: 我花了好几个小时看书。

en: While I was reading, I fell asleep.
zh: 我读着读着就睡着了。

en: It seems, from books, that the colonizers and adventurers went sailing off to a new fine life, a new country, opportunities, and so forth.
zh: 从书上看，那些殖民者和探险家出海是为了追求美好的新生活、新国家和机会等等。

en: I will return your book on Tuesday if I have finished it.
zh: 如果我看完了，周二就把书还你。

en: The girl reading a book is Kate.
zh: 那个正在看书的女孩是凯特。

en: I fell asleep while reading.
zh: 我看书看睡着了。

en: While reading a book, I fell asleep.
zh: 我看书的时候睡着了。

en: I fell asleep while reading a book.
zh: 我在看书时睡着了。

en: I am reading a book.
zh: 我在看书。

en: While reading a book, he fell asleep.
zh: 他看书的时候睡着了。

en: He fell asleep while reading a book.
zh: 他看着看着书就睡着了。

en: I don't have time to read.
zh: 我没时间看书。

en: Reading books is very interesting.
zh: 看书挺有意思的。

en: To read books is custom with me.
zh: 我有看书的习惯。

en: Reading a book is interesting.
zh: 看书很有趣。

en: Reading books is interesting.
zh: 看书很有意思。

en: To read books is important.
zh: 读书很重要。

en: It's important to read books.
zh: 看书很重要。

en: Reading books is important.
zh: 多看书挺重要的。

en: Having read the book, she went shopping.
zh: 看完书以后，她就去逛街了。

en: Don't eat while reading.
zh: 看书的时候别吃东西。

en: By reading books and discussing concepts, a person can gain wisdom and tolerance of differing ideas.
zh: 通过看书和讨论，人能增长智慧，也能变得更包容。

en: Besides lending books, libraries offer various other services.
zh: 除了借书，图书馆还提供很多别的服务。

en: I asked her to send us the book.
zh: 我让她把书寄给我们。

en: The first necessary thing in choosing books to read is to select those which really interest you.
zh: 挑书的时候，最重要的是选你真正感兴趣的。

en: Put your books in order.
zh: 把你的书收拾整齐。

en: Have you ever written a book?
zh: 你写过书吗？

en: Bring your books down.
zh: 把你的书拿下来。

en: Don't open your book.
zh: 别翻开书。

en: I went on with my reading.
zh: 我继续看我的书了。

en: I'd like a book.
zh: 我想要本书。

en: Please give me a book.
zh: 请给我一本书。

en: Please give me the book.
zh: 请把那本书给我。

en: Are you certain that you lost your book, or did you merely misplace it?
zh: 你确定书丢了吗？还是只是随手放哪儿找不着了？

en: I have bought a lot of books.
zh: 我买了很多书。

en: I bought many books.
zh: 我买了不少书。

en: I bought a lot of books.
zh: 我买了一大堆书。

en: I've bought a lot of books.
zh: 我买了很多书了。

en: He has books galore.
zh: 他书多的是。

en: Don't put the books in the shelf upside down.
zh: 别把书倒着放在书架上。

en: Leave the books and magazines as they are.
zh: 书和杂志就那样放着吧，别动。

en: One can classify books into good ones and bad ones.
zh: 书可以分为好书和坏书。

en: A book can be compared to a friend.
zh: 书就像朋友一样。

en: The books were taken away by the students.
zh: 书被学生们拿走了。

en: Choose a book carefully.
zh: 仔细挑一本书。

en: Choose books carefully.
zh: 挑书要细心点儿。

en: Can I take books out?
zh: 可以把书借走吗？

en: A book is made of paper.
zh: 书是纸做的。

en: Books are made out of paper.
zh: 书都是纸做的。

en: The book was given to him by me.
zh: 那本书是我给他的。

en: Nowadays anybody can get books.
zh: 现在谁都能弄到书。

en: Books are now within the reach of everybody.
zh: 现在每个人都能读到书。

en: The books were tied up in a bundle.
zh: 书被捆成了一捆。

en: They have few books.
zh: 他们没几本书。

en: There are almost no books.
zh: 几乎没书。

en: Leave the books as they are.
zh: 书就那样放着吧。

en: We cannot read too many books.
zh: 书读得越多越好。

en: I made an abstract of a book.
zh: 我给一本书写了摘要。

en: Do you agree with what he says in the book?
zh: 你同意他在书里说的吗？

en: You are allowed to check out not more than five books at a time.
zh: 你一次最多只能借五本书。

en: Books are to the mind what food is to the body.
zh: 书籍对于精神，就像食物对于身体。

en: Please tell me how to take a book.
zh: 请告诉我怎么借书。

en: If the list of books is too long, please leave out all foreign books.
zh: 如果书单太长，就把外文书都删掉。

en: I turn over a page of the book.
zh: 我翻了一页书。

en: I have tried every diet that has ever been published and I still haven't lost weight.
zh: 我试过所有公开的减肥法，但还是没瘦。

en: Books and friends should be few but good.
zh: 书和朋友都不在多而在精。

en: Put away your books and notebooks.
zh: 把你的书和笔记本收起来。

en: There were books lying about the room.
zh: 房间里到处乱放着书。

en: If you need books, make the most of the books in the library.
zh: 如果你需要书，就好好利用图书馆。

en: Books occupy most of his room.
zh: 书占了他房间的大半。

en: Please tell me a place to read books.
zh: 请告诉我哪儿能看书。

en: Please tell me where I can read a book.
zh: 请告诉我哪里可以看书。

en: I haven't enough material to write a book yet.
zh: 我现在的素材还不够写一本书。

en: We would be happy to send our book to you when it is published.
zh: 书出版后，我们很乐意寄给你。

en: A book dropped from the shelf.
zh: 一本书从书架上掉了下来。

en: A sheep dog drives the flock to the pasture.
zh: 牧羊犬把羊群赶往牧场。

en: Dr. Makino is looked up to by many people.
zh: 牧野博士受到很多人的敬仰。

en: The cowboys rode into an unknown town.
zh: 牛仔们骑马进了一个陌生的小镇。

en: The cowboys rounded up the herd of cattle.
zh: 牛仔们把牛群赶到了一起。

en: There are a lot of sheep in the pasture.
zh: 牧场里有很多羊。

en: The minister listened to her profession of Christianity.
zh: 牧师倾听了她的基督教信仰告白。

en: The priest made the sign of the cross.
zh: 牧师画了个十字。

en: The priest gave me his blessing.
zh: 牧师给了我他的祝福。

en: The main duty of a priest is to preach in church.
zh: 牧师的主要职责是在教堂讲道。

en: The minister inspired us with a marvelous sermon.
zh: 牧师精彩的布道启发了我们。

en: India ink produces an interesting pattern when used as a dye.
zh: 墨汁当染料用时能产生有趣的图案。

en: I'm behind and exams are coming up.
zh: 我进度落后了，而且快考试了。

en: Hopefully, we'll enjoy our China trip.
zh: 希望我们的中国之行玩得开心。

en: You don't like me, but you were dating me?
zh: 你不喜欢我，当初还跟我约会？

en: We had our photo taken on the beach.
zh: 我们在海滩上拍了照。

en: We watched them score one basket after another.
zh: 我们看着他们接连投篮得分。

en: We are disgusted by his bad manners.
zh: 我们对他没礼貌的行为感到很厌恶。

en: We played around the farm.
zh: 我们在农场周围玩耍。

en: We bought new uniforms to wear at the game.
zh: 我们买了新制服打算比赛时穿。

en: We saw Mac make a fantastic shot.
zh: 我们看到麦克投进了一个精彩绝伦的球。

en: We were satisfied with the delicious food.
zh: 我们对美味的食物感到很满意。

en: Let's all make a toast to our glory days.
zh: 让我们为曾经的辉煌岁月干杯。

en: Our team fought off all the others.
zh: 我们的队伍打败了所有对手。

en: Don't treat me like a child.
zh: 别把我当小孩看。

en: Don't treat me the same way you would treat a child.
zh: 别像对待小孩那样对待我。

en: Can you hide me from the police?
zh: 你能帮我躲开警察吗？

en: You take me for a sucker, don't you?
zh: 你把我当冤大头了吧？

en: She took me half way there, and then played innocent.
zh: 她带我走了一半路，然后就开始装傻。

en: We talked until two in the morning.
zh: 我们聊到凌晨两点。

en: We hit the hay early in order to get up at dawn.
zh: 为了天一亮就起床，我们早早就睡了。

en: Let's pretend that we're soldiers.
zh: 咱们假装是士兵吧。

en: We are in the heyday of youth.
zh: 我们正处于青春年华。

en: We weren't aware of the time.
zh: 我们没注意到时间。

en: We could not play owing to the rain.
zh: 因为下雨，我们没法玩。

en: We're in luck.
zh: 咱们运气真好。

en: We gazed at the beautiful scenery.
zh: 我们欣赏着美丽的风景。

en: We queued up to get tickets for the concert.
zh: 我们排队买音乐会的票。

en: When can we eat?
zh: 咱们什么时候能吃饭？

en: When can we eat, I wonder.
zh: 我在想咱们什么时候能吃饭。

en: We learned at school that the square root of nine is three.
zh: 我们在学校学过，9的平方根是3。

en: We expect him to show up on Saturday afternoon.
zh: 我们预计他周六下午会露面。

en: Our university building is now under construction on a hillside in the north of Fukuoka.
zh: 我们的大学教学楼正在福冈北边的一个山坡上盖着。

en: The water was dead around us.
zh: 我们周围的水一片死寂。

en: If our last batter had not hit a home run, team would have lost the game.
zh: 要不是最后那个击球手打了全垒打，咱们队就输了。

en: We have nothing in common.
zh: 我们完全没有共同点。

en: Why don't you come along with us to the party?
zh: 你干嘛不跟我们一起去派对呢？

en: The prospects for our victory are excellent.
zh: 我们赢的胜算很大。

en: I feel we shall win.
zh: 我觉得我们会赢。

en: I agree with you that we should try again.
zh: 我同意你的看法，咱们应该再试一次。

en: I felt the same way when I first saw Japan from a plane.
zh: 我第一次在飞机上看日本时也有这种感觉。

en: I can run as fast.
zh: 我也能跑那么快。

en: I don't usually take long baths but you're in and out in no time.
zh: 我平时洗澡不算慢，但你这洗得也太快了。

en: Not only I, but also you are responsible for this accident.
zh: 不光是我，你对这起事故也有责任。

en: I am no more happy than you are.
zh: 我跟你一样，都不怎么高兴。

en: May I join you?
zh: 我能加入你们吗？

en: Me too. What about playing tennis.
zh: 我也是，打网球怎么样？

en: I'm in the same boat.
zh: 我的处境也一样。

en: Me, too.
zh: 我也是。

en: I, too, will come in about ten minutes.
zh: 我过个十分钟左右也过来。

en: Let me join in the game.
zh: 让我也一起玩吧。

en: I also like cake.
zh: 我也喜欢吃蛋糕。

en: At the age of six, I was taken to a circus for the first time.
zh: 我六岁的时候第一次被带去马戏团。

en: I'm busy preparing for the trip.
zh: 我正忙着准备旅行呢。

en: And you say I don't have a nose for what's popular.
zh: 你还说我没有流行嗅觉。

en: I got the pears for nothing.
zh: 这些梨我是白拿的。

en: I parted from my friend in anger.
zh: 我气冲冲地和朋友分开了。

en: I prefer soccer to baseball.
zh: 比起棒球，我更喜欢足球。

en: I like outdoor sports, such as baseball, tennis and soccer.
zh: 我喜欢户外运动，比如棒球、网球和足球。

en: I like walking at night.
zh: 我喜欢在晚上散步。

en: I'm a night owl.
zh: 我是个夜猫子。

en: I painted the gate blue.
zh: 我把大门漆成了蓝色。

en: I have many model cars.
zh: 我有很多汽车模型。

en: I am planning to call on Mary the day after tomorrow.
zh: 我打算后天去看玛丽。

en: I mean what I'm saying.
zh: 我是认真的。

en: I had my sister take a picture of me.
zh: 我让妹妹给我拍了张照。

en: I sold my books cheaply.
zh: 我把书便宜卖了。

en: I'm busy.
zh: 我很忙。

en: I have much to do.
zh: 我有很多事要做。

en: I almost always play baseball after school.
zh: 放学后我几乎总是打棒球。

en: I am tired from walking.
zh: 我走累了。

en: I'll be watching you.
zh: 我会盯着你的。

en: I went on foot only one way.
zh: 我只有单程是走路的。

en: I don't think he's playing with a full deck.
zh: 我觉得他脑子不太好使。

en: I study English two hours a day on an average.
zh: 我平均每天学两个小时英语。

en: I told the story to anyone who would listen.
zh: 只要有人愿意听，我就给他们讲这个故事。

en: I belong to the literary circle.
zh: 我是文学圈的人。

en: I dressed up as a girl for the school festival.
zh: 校庆的时候，我扮成了女孩子。

en: I was dressed up as a girl at the school festival.
zh: 校庆那天，我打扮成了女孩子的样子。

en: I have a cold.
zh: 我感冒了。

en: I got nervous on the stage.
zh: 我上台的时候有点紧张。

en: I went there on an errand for Father.
zh: 我是帮我爸去那儿办事的。

en: I don't remember my father's face accurately.
zh: 我记不太清我爸长什么样了。

en: I may not be all that I should be as a husband.
zh: 作为一个丈夫，我可能做得还不够。

en: I got the short straw.
zh: 我抽到了短签。

en: I like watching planes take off.
zh: 我喜欢看飞机起飞。

en: I love her and she loves me.
zh: 我爱她，她也爱我。

en: I prevail on her to have a date with me.
zh: 我好不容易说动她跟我约会。

en: I successfully persuaded her and we went on a date.
zh: 我成功说服了她，然后我们去约会了。

en: I was captivated by her beauty.
zh: 我被她的美貌迷住了。

en: I was very much surprised by her sudden change of mind.
zh: 她突然改变主意，让我大吃一惊。

en: I took down her telephone number in my notebook.
zh: 我把她的电话号码记在笔记本上了。

en: I caught her by the hand.
zh: 我抓住了她的手。

en: I accompanied her on the piano.
zh: 我为她的钢琴伴奏。

en: I made a fuss of her family.
zh: 我对她的家人特别热情。

en: I'm angry with her.
zh: 我在生她的气。

en: I want to marry her.
zh: 我想娶她。

en: I think that she knows the truth.
zh: 我觉得她知道真相。

en: I'm walking beside her.
zh: 我走在她身边。

en: I'm walking with her.
zh: 我和她一起走。

en: I expected her to have come yesterday.
zh: 我本来以为她昨天会来的。

en: I took to her.
zh: 我挺喜欢她的。

en: I can't make out what she said.
zh: 我听不清她说了些什么。

en: I practiced my English on him.
zh: 我找他练了练英语。

en: I stood for him.
zh: 我支持他。

en: I took no little pains to help him out of the difficulty.
zh: 为了帮他摆脱困境，我费了不少心思。

en: I asked him to reconcile them with each other.
zh: 我请他去帮他们讲和。

en: I think him a fool.
zh: 我觉得他就是个傻瓜。

en: I cannot run faster than he.
zh: 我跑得没他快。

en: I can't run as fast as he can.
zh: 我跑不到他那么快。

en: I can't think of his name.
zh: 我想不起他的名字了。

en: I can't remember his name.
zh: 我不记得他的名字了。

en: I can't remember what his name is.
zh: 我记不得他叫什么名字了。

en: I can't trust in his word.
zh: 我不能相信他的话。

en: I am fed up with his vulgar jokes.
zh: 我受够了他那些低级笑话。

en: I don't want to respect a man like him.
zh: 我不想尊重像他那样的人。

en: I have five times as many stamps as he does.
zh: 我的邮票是他的五倍。

en: I have gotten him into trouble.
zh: 我害他惹上了麻烦。

en: I asked him point-blank.
zh: 我开门见山地问了他。

en: I urged him to get away and cool down.
zh: 我劝他先躲开冷静冷静。

en: I am in no small degree indebted to him.
zh: 我欠了他一个大人情。

en: I gave him what little money I had with me.
zh: 我把身上仅有的一点钱都给了他。

en: I shared a room with him.
zh: 我跟他住一间房。

en: I am speculating that he may win the game.
zh: 我猜他可能会赢。

en: I caught sight of him escaping from that shop.
zh: 我看见他从那家店溜出来了。

en: I wanted my hair cut short.
zh: 我想把头发剪短点。

en: I want to ride a horse.
zh: 我想骑马。

en: I want to try riding a horse.
zh: 我想试着骑骑马。

en: I am round shouldered.
zh: 我有点驼背。

en: I feel for my father, who has to work on Sundays.
zh: 我挺心疼我爸的，他星期天还得工作。

en: I sniffed the smell.
zh: 我闻了闻那股味儿。

en: I feel good in a special way.
zh: 我感觉特别爽。

en: I am in pursuit of points.
zh: 我在攒积分。

en: I am looking forward to going to the zoo.
zh: 我很期待去动物园。

en: I don't go by what he says.
zh: 我不按他说的来。

en: I'll be off duty at noon on Saturday.
zh: 我周六中午下班。

en: I was late as a result of the train delay.
zh: 因为火车晚点，我迟到了。

en: I grew up in the country.
zh: 我是在农村长大的。

en: I aimed my gun at the target.
zh: 我把枪瞄准了靶子。

en: I share an apartment with my brother.
zh: 我和我哥合租一间公寓。

en: I work best under pressure.
zh: 我在有压力的时候表现最好。

en: I'm driving into town so I can drop you off on the way.
zh: 我正要开车进城，可以顺路送你。

en: I'll get in.
zh: 我这就进去。

en: I learned many of Takuboku's poems by heart.
zh: 我背熟了很多石川啄木的诗。

en: I get nervous when I speak before a large audience.
zh: 当着这么多人的面说话我会紧张。

en: I plan to take up engineering at college.
zh: 我打算大学学工程。

en: I plan to major in engineering in college.
zh: 我大学打算主修工程专业。

en: I don't feel like eating at all.
zh: 我一点胃口都没有。

en: I was dazzled by the headlights of an approaching car.
zh: 迎面而来的车灯晃得我睁不开眼。

en: I can swim across the river.
zh: 我能游过这条河。

en: I am able to swim across the river.
zh: 我可以游过这条河。

en: I bought this book the other day.
zh: 这本书是我前几天买的。

en: I am afraid of what the teacher will say.
zh: 我怕老师说我。

en: I can no more play the violin than a baby can.
zh: 我根本不会拉小提琴，就跟小宝宝一样。

en: I have a passion for stones.
zh: 我特别喜欢石头。

en: I felt like I was dead.
zh: 我感觉自己跟死了一样。

en: I'm going to give up math.
zh: 我打算放弃数学了。

en: I realized that I couldn't beat him in math.
zh: 我意识到数学我是比不过他了。

en: I belong to the swimming club.
zh: 我是游泳俱乐部的。

en: I'm not very good at swimming.
zh: 我游泳不太行。

en: I'm bad at swimming.
zh: 我不擅长游泳。

en: I can't swim well.
zh: 我游得不好。

en: I can't swim very well.
zh: 我游泳游得不怎么样。

en: I am not the captain of the new team.
zh: 我不是新队的队长。

en: I am slow to adapt myself to new circumstances.
zh: 我这人适应新环境挺慢的。

en: I felt my heart beating violently.
zh: 我感觉到心跳得特别厉害。

en: I love her from the bottom of my heart.
zh: 我打心底里爱她。

en: I overslept and was late for school.
zh: 我睡过头了，上学迟到了。

en: I used to read detective stories before going to bed.
zh: 我以前睡觉前总爱看侦探小说。

en: I want to sleep.
zh: 我想睡觉。

en: I could hardly keep from laughing.
zh: 我差点没憋住笑。

en: As a boy, I used to lie on my back on the grass and look at white clouds.
zh: 我小时候常躺在草地上看白云。

en: As a boy I used to lie on my back and look at white clouds.
zh: 我小时候常仰面躺着看白云。

en: I caught sight of the boy escaping from the classroom.
zh: 我看见那个男孩正从教室里溜走。

en: I must manage on a small income.
zh: 我得靠这点儿微薄的收入过日子。

en: I am not in the least happy.
zh: 我一点儿也不开心。

en: I'd like to engage in foreign trade in the future.
zh: 我以后想做外贸。

en: I don't mind hot weather.
zh: 我不怕热。

en: I was late for the last train.
zh: 我没赶上末班车。

en: I missed the last train.
zh: 我没赶上末班车。

en: I tried to absorb as much of local culture as possible.
zh: 我尽可能多地去感受当地文化。

en: I looked around me.
zh: 我往四周看了看。

en: I live above my means.
zh: 我入不敷出。

en: I've come here to help you.
zh: 我是来帮你的。

en: I was quick tempered when I was young.
zh: 我年轻的时候脾气很暴。

en: I wanted to be an inventor when I was young.
zh: 我小时候想当个发明家。

en: I'm young.
zh: 我还年轻。

en: I have two cars.
zh: 我有两辆车。

en: I own two cars.
zh: 我有两辆车。

en: I studied my part in the play.
zh: 我仔细钻研了我在剧中的角色。

en: I was not being taught to experiment or even to repeat experiments.
zh: 没人教过我做实验，甚至连重复实验都没教过。

en: I have a dictionary.
zh: 我有一本词典。

en: I persist in my popularity.
zh: 我一直在维持自己的人气。

en: I'm getting sick of the ride.
zh: 坐这车坐得我有点烦了。

en: I could not afford to buy a bicycle, much less a car.
zh: 我连自行车都买不起，更别说汽车了。

en: I tried cycling to work for a while but I didn't take to it.
zh: 我试过骑车上班，但我不怎么喜欢。

en: I've already picked out the CD I'm going to buy next.
zh: 我已经选好了下次要买哪张CD。

en: I sometimes meet him at the club.
zh: 我有时会在俱乐部碰到他。

en: I occasionally meet him at the club.
zh: 我偶尔会在俱乐部碰到他。

en: I dealt with the accident.
zh: 我处理了那起事故。

en: I am doing business on a large scale.
zh: 我的生意做得很大。

en: I have been fond of adventure since I was a child.
zh: 我从小就喜欢冒险。

en: When I was a child, I was always drinking milk.
zh: 我小时候总是喝牛奶。

en: I had a quarrel with my sister.
zh: 我和姐姐吵了一架。

en: My family comes before my career.
zh: 家庭对我来说比事业更重要。

en: I spent two hours watching television last night.
zh: 我昨晚看了两个小时电视。

en: I can put up with a house being untidy, but I don't like it to be dirty.
zh: 屋子乱点儿我能忍，但我不喜欢太脏。

en: I met him by accident at the airport yesterday.
zh: 我昨天在机场偶遇了他。

en: I met him by chance at the airport yesterday.
zh: 我昨天在机场碰巧遇到了他。

en: I ran into him unexpectedly at the airport yesterday.
zh: 我昨天在机场意外碰到了他。

en: I unexpectedly ran into him at the airport yesterday.
zh: 我昨天在机场竟然碰到了他。

en: I made a big mistake in choosing my wife.
zh: 我选老婆时犯了个大错。

en: I know little of the recent situation.
zh: 我对最近的情况了解不多。

en: I am interested in chess these days.
zh: 我最近对下棋挺感兴趣的。

en: I shut my eyes again.
zh: 我又闭上了眼睛。

en: I intend to listen to it tonight.
zh: 我打算今晚听听。

en: I'm left-handed.
zh: 我是左撇子。

en: I'm a lefty.
zh: 我是个左撇子。

en: I can't think of his name just now.
zh: 我这会儿想不起他的名字了。

en: Today I have a lot of things to do.
zh: 我今天有很多事要做。

en: I have a lot of things to do today.
zh: 我今天有很多事情。

en: I have a great deal to do today.
zh: 我今天有很多事要处理。

en: I have a good many things to do today.
zh: 我今天有一大堆事要做。

en: I have a lot to do today.
zh: 我今天事儿很多。
